long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you browsing with less keybind.

Keybind list:

    h       scroll left
    j       scroll down
    k       scroll up
    l       scroll right
    b,w       scroll up a page
    f       scroll down a page
    g       scroll to top of the page
    G       scroll to bottom of the page

    B       go back in history
    F       go forward in history
    
    R       reload tab
